item.title: Fly-tipped fencing - Hoblingwell Wood/Leesons Way, 13th January
item.description:
Fencing has been fly-tipped at the woodland edge behind bin adjacent to lamppost 14L5 on Leesons Way. Please could this be removed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leesons Way, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Loads of cigarette thrown, 13th January
item.description:
As I was entering my car this morning with my son, I saw cigarettes thrown all over the floor next to my vehicle with something else thrown on the floor and there were broken pieces of kitchen utensils

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Portland Avenue, Hackney, London

item.title: Abandoned Porche, 13th January
item.description:
This car has been there for 4-5 months, nobody is using it. Another Porche was parked there for months previously, it feeld like it could be a dealer?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heron Court, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dirty street, litter and smashed glass, 13th January
item.description:
This street has not been swept for weeks and it is known drug users and loiterers spoil this area with litter and car windows broken with evidence of this with broken glass. Absolutely depressing and scary for the children who live here and see this on a daily basis.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Barth Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping AGAIN, 13th January
item.description:
This street and surrounding streets are filthy and litter sprawl across the pavements making daily walk to school incredibly depressing. Please can the council send out cleaners as this neighborhood has the same ongoing littering and flytipping problems.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brookdene Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead Squirrel found on the footpath, 13th January
item.description:
A dead squirrel found on the road, and moved to underneath a tree on the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Yorkland Avenue, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Roughly 1 Canon Place, NW3, 13th January
item.description:
The eruv (wire) has come down outside our school. We have wound this clear line up to avoid any hazards (as it was across the pavement and into the street outside the side gate to our school). We have attached it to the eruv pole with a cable tie (above head height) but do not know who to contact about this. However, since the poles are part of the street furniture we thought we would pass it to the Council to deal with/contact the relevant persons. Thank you!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Cannon Place, Belsize Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping AGAIN .. dirty nappies sprawled everywhere., 13th January
item.description:
Ongoing problem with the surrounding streets in Plumstead area. Lack of council cleaners, lack of cameras, flytipping is rife and people don't care anymore. The daily walk to school is a depressing experience and I worry for our children.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Benares Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 13th January
item.description:
Sofa dumped on pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deepdene Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More discarded litter and flytipping, 13th January
item.description:
No council street cleaners seen for a LONG time as this is a ongoing problem. Terrible state of Plumstead streets. Poor example set to children as the walk to school is truly depressing and an eyesore.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hylton Street, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Piles of rubbish along the street. Disgusting and depressing., 13th January
item.description:
People flytipping the street again. This street and surrounding streets have been clearly neglected with obvious absence of council street cleaning.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bannockburn Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household rubbish and old mattresses put next to street furniture, 13th January
item.description:
The occupants have had work done inside the property and put all the rubbish from that outside their property. They have had a “ dispute “ with someone to collect what was agreed, but it’s all been left on the street, as the dispute is over money I believe.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northover, Downham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox on footpath, 13th January
item.description:
Walking with my son to a doctors appointment and there is a dead fox on the footpath (we call it the zig zag)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North End, Greater London
